Hackspace Proposal

Title: Arduino proposal

Submission Date: 11/02/2014

Current Status: Agreed

Proposer: RD

Description: Hackspace to purchase ten of the cheaper Chinese versions of Arduino Uno currently on the market, for Hackspace internal use. Purchase charge £6.59 each from Hong Kong. These can then be kept for training purposes, or offered for sale to course attendees at £7 each (which will give the Hackspace a small profit if sold, and access to what we need for educational purposes otherwise). .

Budget: £65.59

Funding source/model: 100% Hackspace-funded

Resources depended upon: for training and education/project work

Member supporters: RD, AA, RS, WP, JD, KS, CL, JO

Committee supporters: DW, DH, MV
